plugin-package.name: penChantforphotos Theme
plugin-package.short-description: My first attempt at an image-based layout, Penchant For Photos is ideal for a photo gallery or similar website. Penchant For Photos was tested in FF1.0.7 and IE6. It validates as standards-compliant for XHTML 1.1 and CSS.
plugin-package.change-log: Adapted to the latest version of Liferay.
plugin-package.author: acousticsam
